src:
Menkominfo Targetkan RUU Perlindungan Data Pribadi Disahkan Tahun Depan
05 Nov 2019, 13:12 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika (Menkominfo) Johnny G Plate menghadiri rapat di Komisi I DPR RI. Johnny menargetkan Rancangan Undang-Undang (RUU) tentang Perlindungan Data Pribadi disahkan pada Oktober 2020.
"Ditargetkan bulan Desember tahun ini draf RUU tersebut akan dikirimkan ke DPR agar bisa dibahas bersama DPR dari bulan Januari hingga Juli 2020. Diharapkan dapat disahkan jadi UU pada bulan Oktober," kata Johnny dalam rapat di Komisi I DPR, Kompleks MPR/DPR, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Johnny memastikan akan memprioritaskan pembahasan RUU tentang Perlindungan Data Pribadi. Dia berharap RUU tersebut bisa disahkan sesuai dengan target.
"Prioritas 2020 itu kami dengan senang hati selalu akan bersama dengan Komisi I untuk memastikan ini mewujudkan dengan cepat," jelasnya.
text:
The Minister of Communication and Information Targets a Personal Data Protection Bill Passed Next Year
05 Nov 2019, 13:12 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Johnny G Plate attends a meeting at Commission I of the Indonesian Parliament. Johnny is targeting a Bill on the Protection of Personal Data that was passed in October 2020.
"It is targeted that in December this year the draft bill will be sent to the DPR so that it can be discussed with the DPR from January to July 2020. It is hoped that it will be passed into law in October," Johnny said at a meeting at the DPR's Commission I, MPR / DPR Complex, Senayan , Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019).
Johnny sure will prioritize the discussion of the Draft Bill on the Protection of Personal Data. He hoped the bill could be passed according to the target.
"The 2020 priority is that we will be happy to always be with Commission I to ensure that this can be realized quickly," he explained.
